channel.title: SQL Server on Sujith Quintelier
channel.description: Recent content in SQL Server on Sujith Quintelier

item.title: azure: [Launched] Generally Available: Azure SQL updates for late-August 2025
item.description:
Azure SQL and SQL Server received updates in late August 2025, including the general availability of local SQL Server containers via the MSSQL extension for Visual Studio Code.

  • Source: Azure Updates
